name: HEARTBEATS AND BRAINWAVES
description:
We wanted to challenge ourselves to experiment with limited and split senses and experiment with the constraints of game design.
Thus, "HEARTBEATS AND BRAINWAVES" was born.

This project was created during our Game Design studies at ZHdK.
It  was developed during a collaboration between theGamedesign departement of ZHdK and the Voluptas Studio of the ETH.

Thank you for playing our game and we would love to hear your feedback! 

Stay hangry! 🐸
